caption.p: Identification of differentially expressed metabolites in blood from ob/ ob mice

(A and B) Metabolomic analysis using CE-MS in the blood of WT and ob/ ob mice. Histogram showing distribution of log 2 fold changes of the amount of blood polar metabolites between WT and ob/ ob mice (A). The log 2 fold changes of the amounts of the indicated DEMs in the blood between WT and ob/ ob mice (B). Metabolites are abbreviated as follows: 2-AminoBut, 2-aminobutanoate; beta-Ala, beta-alanine; GSSG, Glutathione disulfide. Note that error bars are not provided because the fold change of averaged values of WT and ob/ ob mice were used. See also Table S8.

(C) The log 2 fold changes of polar metabolites measured in the liver, skeletal muscle, and the blood between WT and ob/ ob mice. The value of log 2 fold changes of polar metabolites in the liver ( x axis) and skeletal muscle ( y axis) between WT and ob/ ob mice are shown in scatterplot. The color of each node indicates whether the metabolite is increased DEMs (Magenta) or decreased DEMs (Cyan) in the blood of ob/ ob mice.
(D) The number of the DEMs classified by metabolite class of KEGG database in the liver, skeletal muscle, and blood. Note that we did not measure lipidome in blood. See also Figure S11.
